name: twineedle
flavor_text: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
effect_text_simple: Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to poison the target.
